sdk.title: SDK Overview
sdk.subtitle: Complete reference for the haex-vault SDK APIs and framework integrations.

database.title: Database API
database.description: Query and mutate SQLite data with migrations and Drizzle ORM

storage.title: Storage API
storage.description: Simple key-value storage for settings and preferences

filesystem.title: Filesystem API
filesystem.description: Save and open files through native dialogs

web.title: Web API
web.description: Make HTTP requests to external APIs

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: The haex-vault SDK provides a complete API for building extensions. It includes database access, storage, filesystem operations, web requests, and more.

installation.title: Installation
installation.intro: Install the SDK using your preferred package manager:

frameworkSetup.title: Framework Setup
frameworkSetup.intro: The SDK provides adapters for popular frameworks. Choose your framework below:

clientApi.title: Client API Overview
clientApi.intro: The client provides access to all SDK features:

context.title: Application Context
context.intro: Access the current theme, locale, and platform. The context updates automatically when the user changes settings.
context.themeDesc: Current theme: light, dark, or system
context.platformDesc: Operating system: windows, macos, linux, ios, android
